oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Felix K. Zollicoffer historic marker, Nashville, Tennessee, 1978 June
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An historic marker for Felix K. Zollicoffer that reads: “Ante-bellum newspaper editor and Brigadier General in Confederate Army. Killed at battle of Fishing Creek, Kentucky, January 19, 1862. He was first Confederate general killed in the West.” Zollicoffer is interred in the Nashville City Cemetery. Forms part of the Claynita Harris Slide Collection. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Zollicoffer, Felix Kirk, 1812-1862
Nashville City Cemetery
